openstack_blockstorage_volume_attach_v2.description: Creates an attachment connection to a Block Storage volume

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Block Storage

attach_mode.description: Specify whether to attach the volume as Read-Only

device.description: The device to tell the Block Storage service this

host_name.description: The host to attach the volume to.

initiator.description: The iSCSI initiator string to make the connection.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the `host_name` above.

multipath.description: Whether to connect to this volume via multipath.

volume_id.description: The ID of the Volume to attach to an Instance.

wwpn.description: An array of wwpn strings. Used for Fibre Channel

wwnn.description: A wwnn name. Used for Fibre Channel connections.

data.description: This is a map of key/value pairs that contain the connection

driver_volume_type.description: The storage driver that the volume is based on.

mount_point_base.description: A mount point base name for shared storage.
